page.shortlink: api star rtf to html function
page.discussion: The *RTF_TO_HTML() function converts ASCII encoded RTF text to HTML encoded text.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim rtftext as C dim html_text as C tbl = table.open("customer") tbl.fetch_first() rtftext = *bin_to_rtf(tbl.rtfmemo) ? rtftext = "{\rtf1\ansi \deff0{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;}{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss Arial;}{\f1\fnil Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans;}}{{\f1 \cf1 \fs24 George lived on top of a mountain. }}}" html_text = *rtf_to_html(rtftext) ? html_text =
